post.title: the "official" onkyo tx-sr706 owners thread
post.content: well... i assume this thread might be getting a lot of action soon. the 706 comes with the multieq + dynamiceq + 1080p + a plethora of hdmi ins + the all important blue back-lit volume knob--that is what sold me. i have one being delivered this week. i will report back with my initial impressions.
